wf_activity.name: Notify User's Manager for Pending Approval

sys_variable_value.value:
Hi ${requested_for.manager},
This is to inform you have pending approval for the requests of ${variables.name}. Thank you.
Best Regards, New Joiner Management
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
